issue.title: [Rust] Buffer should accept memory owned by others
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7113](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7113). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently rust Buffer always assume that the memory passed to it is owned by itself, and frees the memory when Buffer is dropped. This is inconvenient when used in cross language environments such as jni.
